sentences.sContent: We eventually took off at 11 o'clock and arrived in Juneau at 1:30.
sentences.sCn: 我们终于在11点起飞，1:30到达朱诺。

sentences.sContent: He took off at once and headed back to the motel.
sentences.sCn: 他出人意料地立刻就离开了，然后回到了那家汽车旅馆。

trans.tranCn: 中文释义:（飞机等）起飞；匆忙离开
trans.tranOther: When an aeroplane takes off, it leaves the ground and starts flying
